name: Night Of The The Living Slimes
name_original: Night Of The The Living Slimes
description:
Space slimes have invaded Earth, and you are the only one who can stop them. Fight them with your slime pistol, and mix them together to create various effects or new slimes.

Made for the JamCraft 5 gamejam.

Credits:
  • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

  • https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
  • https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/  (Used an edited version of one of the characters)
  • https://opengameart.org/content/breaking-bottle
